title: Level 3: Reflection
description: The closing chapter. Reflect on the experience and share appreciation. Can be played with anyone.

cards.content: What surprised you the most about this conversation?
What is one thing you learned about me today?
How do you feel right now compared to when we started?
What is something I said that stuck with you?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Write a one-word title for this chapter of your life.

cards.content: What advice would you give me based on what you know?
What part of my story do you relate to the most?
What do you think is my greatest strength?
What do you think I need to hear right now?
If we met one year from now, how do you think we will have changed?
What is a question you wish I had asked you?
cards.back: Ask it to yourself and answer.

cards.content: WILDCARD
cards.back: Exchange one song recommendation that describes your vibe.

cards.content: What is one thing you admire about the way I think?
Do you feel seen?
What is a challenge you think I am capable of overcoming?
How would you describe me to a stranger?
What energy do I bring to the room?
What is something you want to thank me for?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Take a picture of the other person. Send it to them.

cards.content: What do you think my inner child needs?
If you could gift me one thing (abstract or real), what would it be?
What is the most beautiful thing about me?
What will you remember about this moment?
Do you think we are more similar or different?
What is one wish you have for me?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Hug goodbye (or hello to the next chapter).

cards.content: Has your first impression of me changed?
What is a color you associate with me now?
What makes our connection unique?
What is the most important thing for me to focus on right now?
Who am I to you?
